thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Rooms, Great Food
thread.title_full: Great Rooms, Great Food - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: E2870OKmaryk
title: Great Rooms, Great Food
text: This hotel was on the list of my company's list, but I hadn't used it before my latest trip. So superior to the Embassy Suites down the way! Clean, efficiently laid out rooms. Storage and nice, temperature regulation. Important for me since I froze my butt off when I stayed at the Embassy Suites last year. The room price was high during the week I was there, but the regular rates I've seen are very fair.
